lines.text: n , m , a , b = long long
lines.code: long long n , m , a , b ;

lines.text: read n then m then a then b
if n is a multiple of m
else if n is greater than m
print min of ( n - n / m * m ) * b and ( res * m - n ) * a
lines.code: cout << min ( ( n - n / m * m ) * b , ( res * m - n ) * a ) << endl ;

lines.text: print min of n * b and ( m - n ) * a
lines.code: cout << min ( n * b , ( m - n ) * a ) << endl ;
